description.zh-CN: 1980年代义大利运动，以大胆色彩、几何形状和非对称布局为特色。透过充满活力的构图和大胆图案创造活泼、富有表现力的介面。适合创意专案和视觉故事讲述。1980年代意大利设计运动，采用大胆色彩、几何形状和不对称布局。创造充满活力和几何大胆的设计。
description.en-US: 1980s Italian design movement featuring bold colors, geometric shapes, and asymmetrical layouts Creates vibrant, playful visual experiences with warm palettes and expressive typography for creative applications for joyful, expressive digital experiences Perfect for creative, playful applications and brands targeting younger audiences Brings joy and personality to digital interfaces through expressive visual language This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. vibrant playfulness and geometric boldness.
